thread.title: MPs defeat first round of amendments in Brexit battle | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: MPs defeat first round of amendments in Brexit battle | Daily Mail Online

author: James Tapsfield
title: MPs defeat first round of amendments in Brexit battle | Daily Mail Online
text: MPs defeat first round of Remoaner amendments in Commons Brexit battle after Theresa May tells Parliament 'let's get on with it' PM sets out tough line ahead of wrangling in the Commons over Brexit Bill Europhile MPs have tabled slew of amendments to restrict her negotiating hand More than a dozen Tory rebels could support some of the proposed changes May rejects calls for unilateral UK guarantee of EU citizens' rights after we leave Government wins first vote on the amendments by a comfortable margin of 49 Published: 16:06 GMT, 6 February 2017 | Updated: 22:57 GMT, 6 February 2017 355 shares
